is a subway station on the Tokyo Metro Marunouchi Line in Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. Tokyo Metro runs this station.
Lines.
Awajicho Station is served by the Tokyo Metro Marunouchi Line, and is 7.2 km from northern end of the line at. The station is numbered as "M-19".
The station gives underground passenger connections to Ogawamachi Station on the Toei Shinjuku Line and Shin-Ochanomizu Station on the Tokyo Metro Chiyoda Line.
Station design.
This station has two side platforms that is on the basement ("B1F") level. It has two tracks. Platform 1 is accessed from entrances A1 to A3, and platform 2 can be accessed from entrances A4 to A5. Access for passengers between the two platforms is also provided from an underpass at the south end of the station.
History.
This station opened on 20 March 1956.
Station information.
In 2014, the station was used by around 55,155 people everyday.
